GraphDrawing

Description

For drawing graphs using GraphViz's dot language

class Drawable a Source

Instances

DrawableWithName a => Drawable (Named a) 
(Show q, Show a, Ord q, Ord a) => Drawable (Map (q, a) (BasicPropLogic q))

Drawing boolean formulas from transition table

(Show q, Show a, Ord q, Ord a) => Drawable (AFA q a)

Draw AFAs.

(Show q, Show a, Ord q, Ord a) => Drawable (DFA q a)

Draw DFAs. Prints every part of the graph specified by the transition function and final state set and start state. So make sure it's reachable first!

class DrawableWithName a Source

Instances

DrawableWithName (BasicPropLogic q)

Lets me draw a graph of a boolean formula, named to distinguish it from other graphs
